Are you free?"},{"lineNumber":13745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王立博物館って、確か輸送計画が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Royal Museum, if I remember, has some transport plans...\""},{"lineNumber":13746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いそがし〜〜いわよぉ〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sooo busy~."},{"lineNumber":13747,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう、息つく暇もないもの〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"I hardly have time to catch my breath~.\""},{"lineNumber":13748,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロピチャはのんびりと、ぷかまく餅を食べて","translatedEnglishLine":"Eropicha leisurely ate some pukamaku mochi,"},{"lineNumber":13749,"originalJapaneseLine":"お茶を啜った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and sipped her tea."},{"lineNumber":13750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でもね〜、そういうときこそ焦らずに〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you know, that's exactly when you shouldn't rush~."},{"lineNumber":13751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうのが、大事かな〜って」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think that's what's really important~.\""},{"lineNumber":13752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううぅ、全然理解できない……というか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I can't understand it at all... or rather,"},{"lineNumber":13753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全力でも物理的に終わらない量なのに……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"even with full effort, the amount is physically impossible to finish…!\""},{"lineNumber":13754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジックなら〜、大丈夫よ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it's Magic~, it'll be fine~\""},{"lineNumber":13755,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ホントこの子、いつ仕事してるのかしら……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Seriously, when is this girl actually working...!)"},{"lineNumber":13756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック様！　こちらの案件が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Magic! There's this matter...\""},{"lineNumber":13757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yesss!\""},{"lineNumber":13758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、次はこっち……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, next is this one..."},{"lineNumber":13759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　物資運搬計画、指示してきます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll give instructions for the supply transport plan!\""},{"lineNumber":13760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そこのお兄さ〜ん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey there, mister~."},{"lineNumber":13761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと待って」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a moment.\""},{"lineNumber":13762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...\""},{"lineNumber":13763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その計画書、ちょっと見せて貰ったんだけど〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I took a quick look at that plan document~."},{"lineNumber":13764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょぴっと隙間、あるわよね〜？","translatedEnglishLine":"There's a tiny gap there, right~?"},{"lineNumber":13765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　博物館の品、差し込んでいいかしら〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can I sneak in some museum items?~\""},{"lineNumber":13766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……しかし、行程がギリギリで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... but the schedule is tight..."},{"lineNumber":13767,"originalJapaneseLine":"　重量に関しても無駄を限界まで削ってまして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And regarding weight, we've cut all waste to the limit...\""},{"lineNumber":13768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちからも〜、人出すから〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll send people from our side too~."},{"lineNumber":13769,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大事な文化財なの〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an important cultural asset~\""},{"lineNumber":13770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……！　わ、分かりました、なんとか……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...! I-I understand, I'll manage somehow...!"},{"lineNumber":13771,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分も学校では文化財を専攻した身ですので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since I also specialized in cultural assets at school...\""},{"lineNumber":13772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら〜。偶然偶然〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh~ what a coincidence~."},{"lineNumber":13773,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よろしくお願いしますね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm counting on you~\""},{"lineNumber":13774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーもう、のんびりお茶しちゃってー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, already just leisurely drinking tea!\""},{ "lineNumber":13775, "originalJapaneseLine":"「避難するからって、お茶農家さんから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since we're evacuating, the tea farmers gave us"},{"lineNumber":13776,"originalJapaneseLine":"　良いお茶、頂いたの〜。マジックもどう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"some good tea~. Magic, would you like some too?\""},{ "lineNumber":13777, "originalJapaneseLine":"「無理無理無理無理！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way, no way, no way, no way!\""},{ "lineNumber":13778, "originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Magic!\""},{ "lineNumber":13779, "originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うん、いくー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah, I'm going!\""},{ "lineNumber":13780, "originalJapaneseLine":"「かきかき、さかさか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Scribble scribble, scratch scratch...\""},{ "lineNumber":13781, "originalJapaneseLine":"「では、失礼しま……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, excuse me...\""},{ "lineNumber":13782, "originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ごめんなさい〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, sorry~."},{"lineNumber":13783,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行きがけに、これ博物館に渡してきてくれる〜？」","translatedEnglishLine":"On your way, could you deliver this to the museum~?\""},{ "lineNumber":13784, "originalJapaneseLine":"「は、了解です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ye-yes, understood."},{"lineNumber":13785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　博物館ならすぐそこですし","translatedEnglishLine":"The museum is just right there after all.\""},{"lineNumber":13786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがと〜ね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thanks a lot~\""},{"lineNumber":13787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えぇと、次は……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, next is...!\""},{ "lineNumber":13788, "originalJapaneseLine":"「マジックも〜、どっしり構えたら〜？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Magic, why don't you take it easy too~?\""},{ "lineNumber":13789, "originalJapaneseLine":"「エロピチャは構えすぎよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eropicha, you're too laid back!"},{"lineNumber":13790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕事しなくていいの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Aren't you going to work?\""},{ "lineNumber":13791, "originalJapaneseLine":"「ん〜、今日はもう、おしまいにしようかなって〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm~, I think I'll be done for today~\""},{ "lineNumber":13792, "originalJapaneseLine":"「気楽なものね、もう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're so carefree already...\""},{ "lineNumber":13793,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロピチャはのんびりと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Eropicha lived leisurely,"},{ "lineNumber":13794,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分のペースで生きていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"at her own pace."},{ "lineNumber":13795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お・か・あ・さ・ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mo-ther\""},{"lineNumber":13796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..................\""},{"lineNumber":13797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほら〜、マジック〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on~, Magic~."},{"lineNumber":13798,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言ってご覧なさい〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Say it~\""},{"lineNumber":13799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お・か・あ・さ・ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mo-ther...\""},{"lineNumber":13800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リピートアフターミ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Repeat after me~\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 机についてペンを走らせるマジックの隣で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to Magic, who was seated at the desk scribbling with a pen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャはお茶を啜っていた。
王立博物館って、確か輸送計画が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Royal Museum, if I remember, has some transport plans..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、息つく暇もないもの〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hardly have time to catch my breath~."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャはのんびりと、ぷかまく餅を食べて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha leisurely ate some pukamaku mochi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもね〜、そういうときこそ焦らずに〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you know, that's exactly when you shouldn't rush~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうのが、大事かな〜って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think that's what's really important~."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううぅ、全然理解できない……というか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I can't understand it at all... or rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力でも物理的に終わらない量なのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even with full effort, the amount is physically impossible to finish…!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ホントこの子、いつ仕事してるのかしら……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Seriously, when is this girl actually working...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック様！　こちらの案件が……」
物資運搬計画、指示してきます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give instructions for the supply transport plan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その計画書、ちょっと見せて貰ったんだけど〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I took a quick look at that plan document~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょぴっと隙間、あるわよね〜？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a tiny gap there, right~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 博物館の品、差し込んでいいかしら〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can I sneak in some museum items?~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う……しかし、行程がギリギリで……
重量に関しても無駄を限界まで削ってまして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And regarding weight, we've cut all waste to the limit..."
"We'll send people from our side too~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む……！　わ、分かりました、なんとか……！
自分も学校では文化財を専攻した身ですので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I also specialized in cultural assets at school..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よろしくお願いしますね〜」
「はーもう、のんびりお茶しちゃってー！」
「避難するからって、お茶農家さんから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since we're evacuating, the tea farmers gave us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良いお茶、頂いたの〜。マジックもどう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some good tea~. Magic, would you like some too?"
"No way, no way, no way, no way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行きがけに、これ博物館に渡してきてくれる〜？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On your way, could you deliver this to the museum~?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 博物館ならすぐそこですし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The museum is just right there after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジックも〜、どっしり構えたら〜？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Magic, why don't you take it easy too~?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん〜、今日はもう、おしまいにしようかなって〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm~, I think I'll be done for today~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャはのんびりと、
自分のペースで生きていた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
